article:
{{Infobox VG |image = |developer = Opus |publisher = Sony Computer Entertainment
|designer = |released = |genre = Music |modes = Single-player |platforms =
PlayStation |media = 1 CD-ROM }} 'Fluid' (known in Japan as 'Depth') is a music
video game developed by Opus and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for
the PlayStation. The game's concept is an interactive sound lab which allows the
player to create dance and electronic music. The player uses a dolphin character
in 'Cruise Stage' to collect samples for mixing in the 'Groove Editor'.
